articles.title: Don’t waste your money on Audible — use this free app instead - Digital Trends
articles.description: While Audible is the most dominant audiobook listening app on the market, it's far from the best — and easily outdone by its free alternative, Libby.
articles.content: It feels safe to say that Audible is the most popular app for those looking to get into audiobooks. It’s owned by Amazon, so there’s big money behind it, making the app nearly inescapable. While it’s… [+5127 chars]
